channel.title: Fishing
channel.description: So i have the fishing spots set up and the xp set and emote set now all i need to know is how to make it loop through and wait about 3 seconds before catching another fish any help?

item.title: Fishing
item.dc:creator: @_The_killers -_The killers_-
item.description:
@_The_killers wrote:

[quote=“brenda, post:4, topic:300673”][quote author=-The killers- link=topic=396933.msg2947878#msg2947878 date=1252309033]
add timer like this
this u need on the top

import java.util.Timer;
import java.util.TimerTask;

and this u need add on the object

fishingTimer = 10;
[/quote]

thanks killers…i couldnt remember code :([/quote]
np;)

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing

item.description:
@_The_killers wrote:

add timer like this
this u need add on the top

and this u need add on the object
